scripts.copy-libs: npm run copy-handlebars && npm run copy-jquery && npm run copy-lodash && npm run copy-moment && npm run copy-bootstrap && npm run copy-select2 && npm run copy-parsley && npm run copy-datetimepicker && npm run copy-treeview && npm run copy-datatables
scripts.copy-handlebars: mkdir -p wildlifelicensing/static/wl/libs && cp node_modules/handlebars/dist/handlebars.amd.min.js wildlifelicensing/static/wl/libs/ && cp node_modules/handlebars/dist/handlebars.runtime.amd.min.js wildlifelicensing/static/wl/libs/
scripts.copy-select2: cp node_modules/select2/dist/js/select2.full.min.js wildlifelicensing/static/wl/libs/ && cp node_modules/select2/dist/css/select2.min.css wildlifelicensing/static/wl/libs/ && cp node_modules/select2-bootstrap-5-theme/dist/select2-bootstrap-5-theme.min.css wildlifelicensing/static/wl/libs/
scripts.copy-datatables: cp node_modules/datatables.net/js/jquery.dataTables.min.js wildlifelicensing/static/wl/libs/ && cp node_modules/datatables.net-bs5/js/dataTables.bootstrap5.min.js wildlifelicensing/static/wl/libs/ && cp node_modules/datatables.net-bs5/css/dataTables.bootstrap5.min.css wildlifelicensing/static/wl/libs/ && cp node_modules/datatables.net-plugins/sorting/datetime-moment.js wildlifelicensing/static/wl/libs/
